ModuleDescription: This module targets students who have completed the elementary Spanish modules (LAS1201 and LAS2201). It offers a combination of listening and speaking practice with a review of key concepts of Spanish grammar via targeted reading and writing activities. This module continues to incorporate Hispanic cultural elements through representative texts and audiovisual materials from the Spanish-speaking world.
Prerequisite: LAS2201 Spanish 2 or YLS1202 Introductory Spanish II, or placement test
